trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMH102_03762_SEQ_00<tab>Krile can see the steely resolve in your eyes, and suspects she knows to where duty calls you.
TEXT_LUCKMH102_03762_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Crystal Exarch in the Ocular.
TEXT_LUCKMH102_03762_KRILE_000_000<tab>I take it you're ready to return to the First?

TEXT_LUCKMH102_03762_KRILE_000_001<tab>Then I would ask that you apprise the others of recent events here in the Source. Namely, Zenos's return and the development of a new Ultima Weapon. As for their bodies, you may assure them Master Matoya and I will continue doing what we can to keep their corporeal aether stable.
TEXT_LUCKMH102_03762_KRILE_000_002<tab>Safe travels, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope to see you, and the other Scions, soon.

TEXT_LUCKMH102_03762_MYSTERYVOICE_000_010<tab>You've come at a most opportune time, my friend. I've made something of a breakthrough in my research on the soul and a means to return the Scions home. I trust you too have been making good use of your time?
TEXT_LUCKMH102_03762_MYSTERYVOICE_000_011<tab>Ill tidings from the Source, you say?
TEXT_LUCKMH102_03762_MYSTERYVOICE_000_012<tab>Then I will summon the others that we might all be apprised of the situation.
